summary: This is a forwarded email from November 29, 2007, containing a link to an article about a civil lawsuit in New York against Jeffrey Epstein. The email is sent to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of Florida, indicating legal awareness and potential coordination regarding Epstein's legal troubles.

persons.name: Maximilia Cordero
persons.context: Her name appears in the URL of an article about a civil lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein, which is the subject of this forwarded email.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the linked article is a civil lawsuit in New York filed against him.

events.title: Civil lawsuit filed against Epstein in NY
events.description: A civil lawsuit is filed against Jeffrey Epstein in New York, as reported in an online article linked in the email.

locations: 99 NE 4th Street, Miami, FL (Office of the Assistant United States Attorney, Southern District of Florida)
keyFacts: On November 29, 2007, an email was forwarded containing a link to an article about a civil lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein in New York.

The email was sent to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of Florida, suggesting federal prosecutors in Florida were monitoring civil litigation against Epstein in other jurisdictions.
The article URL references 'maximilia_cordero', indicating she may be a plaintiff, attorney, or other figure involved in the lawsuit.
